Class LLDPUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Set of utilities for handling our LLDP virtualization hacks
    Author:
    capveg

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean handleLLDPFromController(FVPacketOut po, WorkerSwitch workerSwitch, OriginalSwitch fvSlicer)
      If this msg is lldp, then 1) add a slice identifying trailer 2) send to switch -- all slices can send lldp, no matter flowspace 3) return true, we've handled this packet else return false
      static boolean handleLLDPFromSwitch(FVPacketIn pi, WorkerSwitch workerSwitch)
      If this msg is lldp, then 1) remove the slice identifying trailer 2) send to controller -- all slices can send lldp, no matter flowspace 3) return true, we've handled this packet

    • Method Detail

      • handleLLDPFromController

        public static boolean handleLLDPFromController(FVPacketOut po,
                               WorkerSwitch workerSwitch,
                               OriginalSwitch fvSlicer)
        If this msg is lldp, then 1) add a slice identifying trailer 2) send to switch -- all slices can send lldp, no matter flowspace 3) return true, we've handled this packet else return false
        Parameters:
        po - message
        workerSwitch - switch classifier
        fvSlicer - slice polcies
        Returns:
        did we handle the message?

      • handleLLDPFromSwitch

        public static boolean handleLLDPFromSwitch(FVPacketIn pi,
                           WorkerSwitch workerSwitch)
        If this msg is lldp, then 1) remove the slice identifying trailer 2) send to controller -- all slices can send lldp, no matter flowspace 3) return true, we've handled this packet

        workerSwitch -
        Returns:
        did we handle this message?
